thread.title: Pats take advantage of Colts' aggressive play in 34-27 win
thread.title_full: Pats take advantage of Colts' aggressive play in 34-27 win

title: Pats take advantage of Colts' aggressive play in 34-27 win
text:
> Indiana Pats take advantage of Colts' aggressive play in 34-27 win Indianapolis Colts quarterback Andrew Luck (12) is sacked by New England Patriots defensive end Chandler Jones (95) and defensive tackle Dominique Easley (99) in the second half of an NFL football game in Indianapolis, Sunday, Oct. 18, 2015. New England won 34-27. (AP Photo/John Minchillo) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
